fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Culture, Education and training, Business and Industry, Youth, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Communication
eu_initiatives:
Creative Skillset is currently principally involved in the EU though Creative Europe’s Fabula Mundi programme 
 
Fabula Mundi is a theatre cooperation project involving 10 EU countries working in partnership to promote contemporary playwriting and dramaturgy and encourage the professional development of playwrights. Eighty playwrights are taking part in the initiative which involves national and international meetings in partner countries as well as a programme of workshops, residencies and stage presentations across the EU. We write and distribute a monthly newsletter and are promoting the initiative through social media.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:

supervised by UK Commission for Employment and Skills 
 
Member of British Screen Advisory Council 
 
European Sector Skills Council for the Audiovisual and Live Performance Sectors
goals__remit:
Creative Skillset is the industry-led skills body for the UK’s screen-based creative industries, including film, high end and other television, VFX, animation and games. 
We work across the UK with employers, individuals, learning/training providers, trade associations, unions and government to ensure the screen industries have the skilled workforce they need. We are the recognised leader in developing professional skills in the UK’s screen-based creative industries to improve productivity, creativity and employability. We identify training needs and help tackle them.
